Jesse James (Brad Pitt) was the most notorious off-the-law of America. While planning another of his major robberies, discovers that his enemies, eager for glory and fortune, had launched a race for their capture. When Jesse declares war on all of them, Robert Ford (Casey Affleck) enters his legendary gang. What he does not know is that the new member of the group also has a plan to kill him.
